author: zhokin2
body:
Hcal certification monitoring tool (CMT) and corresponding CMT web site:
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/eosweb/hcal/HcalRemoteMonitoring/CMT
are provided since 2013 for much easy and faster certification of lumi sections
 in global runs. 


 CMT preparation for Run3: full validation chain up to visualization on CMT site, including condor scripts running
title: HCAL CMT tool update for Run3
